A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really liked the visuals\, the creativity behind the aliens and planets\, the space battles and that throne room fight near the end of the second act. It's like all the places where JJ Abrams wanted to take the story where destroyed. Wasted opportunity with Snoke\, the knights of Ren and the Jedi mythos. That Casino subplot was garbage! Wasted opportunities. Rian is so much better than this. What happened??
